reviews.review_msg: Aaron Windel is the kind of professor I want to listen to lecture without having to writ any exams. This class dates back from 55BC to present so be ready. Aaron tries his best but theres far too much info in this class to be covered. Dr. Windel is a super kind professor with alot of info and great to go see in office hours! I worked/read ALOT.
Lovely man... So glad I took his class. Really patient and passionate. Wish he taught the tutorials cause the TAs sucked. Highly recommend Aaron as a professor
